abstract: Sander Bernard Jozef Boschker (Dutch pronunciation: [ˈsɑndər ˈbɔskər]; born 20 October 1970) is a Dutch professional footballer who plays for FC Twente as a goalkeeper.During a professional career which spanned more than two decades he played mostly for Twente (two spells, 22 seasons), appearing in 555 Eredivisie games and winning four major titles.
comment: Sander Bernard Jozef Boschker (Dutch pronunciation: [ˈsɑndər ˈbɔskər]; born 20 October 1970) is a Dutch professional footballer who plays for FC Twente as a goalkeeper.During a professional career which spanned more than two decades he played mostly for Twente (two spells, 22 seasons), appearing in 555 Eredivisie games and winning four major titles.
